duties_responsibilities.duty: Negotiate contracts and manage all third-party payment gateway partners.
Provide useful and relevant reporting on payment processing KPI’s.
Assess, select, and engage third-party payment partners after thorough review of available options.
Oversee the onboarding of new payment partners and ensure optimal rates.
Create and prioritize the Product Roadmap and plan the various iterations in development delivery.
Accountable for the user journey in the payment’s cashier / product banking pages.
Ensure stakeholder engagement and facilitate presentations on payment-related projects.
Drive delivery of an online payment product suite aligned with the company's strategic vision.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or minimum of three-year product related work experience in a related business function.
